name: messed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
mess
[ T ] mainly US informal (UK mess up) to make something untidy: Don't you dare mess my hair!
[ I ] to leave solid waste somewhere: The neighbour's dog has messed on our lawn again!
